trackObjectivesTitle:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the track objectives section
**UI Location**: Student tooltip → Track objectives section header
**When Users See This**: When the student has track objectives to display in their tooltip
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Track objectives"
favorited:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating the student is favorited
**UI Location**: Student tooltip → Favorited status
**When Users See This**: When the student is marked as a favorite
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Favorited"
unableToLoad:
**Functional Purpose**: Error message when student information cannot be loaded
**UI Location**: Student tooltip (main content area)
**When Users See This**: If there's an error fetching student data for the tooltip
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Unable to load information"
